thread.title: Bayfield’s Goddard qualifies for state XC
thread.title_full: Bayfield’s Goddard qualifies for state XC

title: Bayfield’s Goddard qualifies for state XC
text: Bayfield’s Goddard qualifies for state XC Bayfield’s Goddard qualifies for state XC Herald Staff Report Share W ith a strong showing at the Class 3A Region 1 cross country meet in Pagosa Springs, Bayfield High School’s Bridget Goddard advanced to the state meet. Goddard’s time of 22 minutes, 11 seconds earned her a 13th-place finish and a chance to run against the best runners in the state in her class. Bayfield finished sixth overall with a total of 166. Lexa Fleming narrowly missed qualifying with Goddard. Fleming’s time of 22:37 gave her a 17th-place finish. Rachel Cooper finished 43rd (24:14), Amber Johnson crossed the line 53rd (25:53); Sarah Ruybal took 60th (27:54); Brittany Birk was 62nd (28:43); Mylee Sanders placed 66th (30:01); and Jade Sanders came in 71st (33:03). Goddard will run again at the CHSAA Cross Country Championships. The 3A girls race is scheduled to start at noon Saturday at the Norris Penrose Event Center in Colorado Springs.
